summary: Applies random time-domain masks to spectrograms, simulating missing temporal information according to the SpecAugment technique, with configurable maximum mask length and probability of application.
business_intent: Improves the robustness and generalization of audio‑based machine‑learning models by augmenting training data with realistic temporal occlusions, helping reduce overfitting and enhancing performance on tasks such as speech recognition, audio classification, and sound event detection.
